DOC.brief_summary: This study compare three method deliver mechanical ventilation use test lung . Ventilation deliver use ( 1 ) mask hold place caregiver , ( 2 ) mask strap model use secure device , ( 3 ) supraglottic airway . Endpoints include respiratory rate tidal volume .
DOC.brief_title: Ability Caregivers Provide Ventilation With SAVe Resuscitator Model
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate ability caregiver provide adequate ventilation ( respiratory rate tidal volume ) model upper airway lung . Ventilation deliver mask hold place caregiver , mask strap model use secure device provide ventilator , follow placement supraglottic airway .
DOC.criteria: Voluntary participation Nurse , respiratory therapist , physician involve care patient require ventilation airway management
